td.content: s:pt presents with severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye for 3 weeks. pt also reports severe difficulty reading, severe poor night vision. he is a white male retired aged 64 years. o:Height 68 in, Weight 132 lbs, Temperature 97.7 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

s:64 yr old male presents with severe difficulty reading. pt also reports severe poor night vision, severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. he has been a chronic smoker for the last 2 years Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 68 in, Weight 133 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Full-Field Electroretinogram.

td.content: s:a m aged 65 ys presents with severe poor night vision, severe difficulty reading. he has history of severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye. he smokes one pack daily for 4 years Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 68 in, Weight 133 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

td.content: s:patient presents with severe difficulty reading, severe poor night vision and severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye. These symptoms are present for about 2 weeks. he is a 65 yo m. o:Height 68 in, Weight 131 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered Full-Field Electroretinogram.
